text: Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 55. I will not accept a water vessel with a hand soiled by food: a training to be observed.
๕๕. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่รับโอน้ำด้วยมือเปื้อนอามิส”
55. I shall not accept a drinking-water pot with a hand soiled by food: this is a training to be done.
